ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISPICKVAL( FieloEE__IdentificationType__c, '' ) && ( FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c != '' ) ) || ( ! ISPICKVAL( FieloEE__IdentificationType__c, '' ) && ( FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c == '' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must complete Identification type and Identification Number or neither of both
